library(arsenal)

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r table1}

df2 <- df2 %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(starts_with("SNP")), ~factor(.))


tab1 <- tableby(case_control ~ height + bmi + gender + education + SNP1 + SNP2 + SNP3 + SNP4 + SNP5 + exp1 + exp2 + exp3 + exp4 + exp5 + exp6 + exp7 + exp8 + exp9 + exp10,
                data = df2, 
                control = tableby.control(numeric.test = "anova",
                                          cat.test = "chisq", 
                                          cat.simplify = TRUE,
                                          ordered.simplify = TRUE,
                                          numeric.stats = c("N", "Nmiss","meansd", "medianq1q3", "medianrange"),
                                          cat.stats = c("N", "Nmiss", "countpct")))

summary(tab1, pfootnote = TRUE, title = "Descriptive Table", term.name = TRUE, total = TRUE, digits = 2)

````
